alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lunenburg and Nottoway Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nottoway to near Rehoboth. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackstone, Crewe, Victoria, Kenbridge, Nottoway, Lunenburg, Burkeville, Rehoboth, Spainville, Bacons Fork, North Wellville, Irby, Wilburn, Murdocks, Nutbush, The Falls, Wellville, Dominy Corner, Fergusonville and Oral Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
